languages.text: {n}Рета немного бледнеет, но решительно вздергивает подбородок.{/n} "Мы, чтобы эту штуку найти и достать, жизнями рисковали. Это — наше ремесло, мы этим кормим свои семьи. Не можем мы ее просто так отдать, не по чести это и не по справедливости".

{n}Reta pales a little but lifts her chin with determination.{/n} "We risked our lives to find this thing and pull it out. This is our trade, it's what feeds our families. We can't just give it away, that wouldn't be right — or fair."
languages.original_text: {n}Рета немного бледнеет, но решительно вздергивает подбородок.{/n} "Мы, чтобы эту штуку найти и достать, жизнями рисковали. Это — наше ремесло, мы этим кормим свои семьи. Не можем мы ее просто так отдать, не по чести это и не по справедливости".

traits.locale_text: {n}Reta pales a little, but lifts her chin with determination.{/n} "We risked our lived to find this thing and pull it out. This is our trade, it's what feeds our families. We can't just give it away, that wouldn't be right — or fair."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

traits.locale_text: {n}Reta pales a little, but lifts her chin with determination.{/n} "We risked our lived to find this thing and pull it out. This is our trade, it's what feeds our families. We can't just give it away, that wouldn't be right — or fair."

traits.locale_text: {n}Reta pales a little but lifts her chin with determination.{/n} "We risked our lives to find this thing and pull it out. This is our trade, it's what feeds our families. We can't just give it away, that wouldn't be right — or fair."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: {n}蕾塔脸色有些发白，但还是坚定地扬起了下巴。{/n}“这个东西是我们冒着生命危险抢出来的。这是我们的营生，我们得靠这些东西养活我们的家人，不能就这么把它拱手送人。这么做是不对的，也不公平。”
languages.original_text: {n}Reta pales a little but lifts her chin with determination.{/n} "We risked our lives to find this thing and pull it out. This is our trade, it's what feeds our families. We can't just give it away, that wouldn't be right — or fair."

traits.locale_text: {n}蕾塔脸色有些发白，但还是坚定地扬起了下巴。{/n}“这个东西是我们冒着生命危险抢出来的。这是我们的营生，我们得靠这些东西养活我们的家人，不能就这么把它拱手送人。这么做是不对的，也不公平。”
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: {n}Reta palidece un poco, pero levanta la barbilla, determinada.{/n} «Arriesgamos nuestras vidas para encontrar esto y sacarlo. Esta es nuestra profesión; es lo que da de comer a nuestras familias. No podemos regalarlo sin más. No estaría bien. No sería justo».
languages.original_text: {n}Reta pales a little but lifts her chin with determination.{/n} "We risked our lives to find this thing and pull it out. This is our trade, it's what feeds our families. We can't just give it away, that wouldn't be right — or fair."

traits.locale_text: {n}Reta palidece un poco, pero levanta la barbilla, determinada.{/n} «Arriesgamos nuestras vidas para encontrar esto y sacarlo. Esta es nuestra profesión; es lo que da de comer a nuestras familias. No podemos regalarlo sin más. No estaría bien. No sería justo».
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: {n}レタは少し青ざめたものの決意を込めて顔を上げた。{/n}「私たちは命がけでこれを見つけ出し、引き抜きました。これは私たちの商売で、家族を養うためのものです。これをただ手放すことはできません。そんなことは正しくも…公平でもありません」
languages.original_text: {n}Reta pales a little but lifts her chin with determination.{/n} "We risked our lives to find this thing and pull it out. This is our trade, it's what feeds our families. We can't just give it away, that wouldn't be right — or fair."

traits.locale_text: {n}レタは少し青ざめたものの決意を込めて顔を上げた。{/n}「私たちは命がけでこれを見つけ出し、引き抜きました。これは私たちの商売で、家族を養うためのものです。これをただ手放すことはできません。そんなことは正しくも…公平でもありません」
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: {n}Reta erblasst ein wenig, hebt aber entschlossen ihr Kinn.{/n} "Wir haben unser Leben riskiert, um dieses Ding zu finden und rauszuholen. Das ist unser Beruf, damit ernähren wir unsere Familien. Wir können es nicht einfach weggeben, das wäre nicht richtig – und nicht fair."
languages.original_text: {n}Reta pales a little but lifts her chin with determination.{/n} "We risked our lives to find this thing and pull it out. This is our trade, it's what feeds our families. We can't just give it away, that wouldn't be right — or fair."

traits.locale_text: {n}Reta erblasst ein wenig, hebt aber entschlossen ihr Kinn.{/n} "Wir haben unser Leben riskiert, um dieses Ding zu finden und rauszuholen. Das ist unser Beruf, damit ernähren wir unsere Familien. Wir können es nicht einfach weggeben, das wäre nicht richtig – und nicht fair."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: {n}Réta pâlit légèrement, mais relève la tête d'un air déterminé.{/n} « On a risqué nos vies pour trouver ce truc et le récupérer. C'est notre métier, notre gagne-pain. On ne peut pas simplement vous le donner, ce ne serait ni juste ni équitable. »
languages.original_text: {n}Reta pales a little but lifts her chin with determination.{/n} "We risked our lives to find this thing and pull it out. This is our trade, it's what feeds our families. We can't just give it away, that wouldn't be right — or fair."

traits.locale_text: {n}Réta pâlit légèrement, mais relève la tête d'un air déterminé.{/n} « On a risqué nos vies pour trouver ce truc et le récupérer. C'est notre métier, notre gagne-pain. On ne peut pas simplement vous le donner, ce ne serait ni juste ni équitable. »
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: {n}Reta'nın beti benzi atsa da kararlılıkla başını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Şu zımbırtıyı bulup çıkarmak için kellemizi koltuğumuza aldık. Bizim ekmek teknemiz bu, ailelerimizin karınlarını böyle böyle doyuruyoruz. Size öylece veremeyiz... Ne doğru olur ne de adil."
languages.original_text: {n}Reta pales a little but lifts her chin with determination.{/n} "We risked our lives to find this thing and pull it out. This is our trade, it's what feeds our families. We can't just give it away, that wouldn't be right — or fair."
